description: The Huntsman is a fictional character in Marvel Comics who is a tracker/hunter of the Olympian Gods for Zeus. Over the years he has appeared mainly as an enemy of Hercules.
name: Huntsman
powers: javelin made of light that never misses
Wields a javelin made of light that never misses a target
Ability to both inspire tremendous fear in gods
summon or create duplicates of Greek Mythology creatures
